name: Galactic Breakout
description:
Galactic Breakout is a modern interpretation of the classic Arkanoid, where you need to break different types of blocks with the paddle - your best friend.

Each of the 75 levels has been thoroughly created by hand and the difficulty will gradually increase with each level.

Main features

  • 3 acts with 25 levels in each
  • 10 unique power-ups - with 3 ultimate ones

  • 10 unique and challenging debuffs - some can easily reduce your score points

  • Various visual effects for different types of blocks

  • Custom and Deterministic paddle physics - control your ball movement as you wish
  • Full gamepad support - use your gamepad to control your paddle and navigate through the UI. You don't need a mouse or keyboard

  • Steam achievements - 15+ various game achievements to encourage you in your journey
